nodes.text: Leisure is a short comic story published in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Comic UK 6.22, and later in Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine 7.

As the Clone Wars continue the wealthy citizens of Coruscant still crave leisure opportunities – be it games of chance, cutting-edge fashion, or even the thrill of high speed! Welcome back to the world of podracing in this issue of Star Wars: The Clone Wars Magazine!
